long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your AI Recruiting Assistant

Simplify interviews with Quil's AI note-taker. Quil eliminates manual note-taking, captures valuable insights, and automatically updates your ATS.

At Quil, we are at the forefront of reshaping the hiring landscape with our groundbreaking AI Recruiting Assistant. Envision a world where the burdens of taking meticulous interview notes and manual updates to your Applicant Tracking System (ATS) become a thing of the past. Our innovative tool not only effortlessly captures and organizes interview insights but also seamlessly integrates with leading ATS platforms such as Lever, Zoho Recruit, and Greenhouse, among others.

By automating these traditionally time-consuming tasks, we liberate your schedule, providing you with more time to connect with candidates and make critical decisions that drive your hiring success. Consider our AI Notetaker as your virtual hiring assistant, offering real-time recommendations to enhance the efficiency of your hiring process. At Quil.ai, we go beyond being a mere tool; we position ourselves as your strategic partner in simplifying the intricate world of hiring. Embrace a superior way of recruiting with us.
